doc.name: TextEditorTableau
doc.description: A tableau representing a text window. The constructor of this class creates the window. The text window itself is an instance of TextEditor, and can be accessed using the getFrame() method. As with other tableaux, this is an entity that is contained by an effigy of a model. There can be any number of instances of this class in an effigy.
doc.author: Steve Neuendorffer and Edward A. Lee
